name: NUITEQ
overview:
NUITEQ is a multi-touch solutions provider, offering software, hardware and services.

NUITEQ’s vision is to change the way people interact with technology, through the mission of making the interface between users and technology more natural.

NUITEQ’s multi-touch software product Snowflake Suite and customized software solutions are available to VAR’s, SI’s, OEM’s, software developers and end clients.

NUITEQ’s aims to be hardware technology platform agnostic, wishing to offer compatibility of its software with all significant multi-touch hardware technology platforms that are available, including 3M, N-trig, NextWindow, Lumio, IR Touch, dreaMTouch, Nexio, rear camera based systems and others.

Clients range from Fortune 100 companies to government organizations.

Headquarters are located in Skelleftea in the North of Sweden and its Asia office is located in Singapore.
